channel.title: Best Website For A RSPS?
channel.description:
Hello, and I was wondering what the best website would be to use for a rsps, as my server is starting to get more people. For things such as -Domain Name -Forums -Tabs -Webclient -Easy to Use -Etc
Please comment with the website adress. Since this is a community, I decided to get an opinion from various people. Please, no flaming.

item.title: Best Website For A RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

http://hosting24.com - Its only like $7-8 a month, 30-day money back guarentee, easy to use control panel, easy forums, ect…

Read full topic

item.title: Best Website For A RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

It’s really not a domain name, but rather the best webhost service providers. Personally Arvixe provides very good service, an easy to use control panel, and a cheap $7/month price. On purchase of the web server, you get a free domain for life, the web server is only $4/month if you buy in bulk amounts (eg. 1 year/$40). As for forums I personally like SMF the best as it’s set up nicely and work smoothly and fast. I personally like it because I do website development and it’s easier to edit the PHP files of SMF. However, even if you’re not wanting to do that, it’s still a great piece of open source forums software. Other options are vBulletin, IPboard, myBB, etc. I’m not sure what you mean for tabs or webclient though.

Read full topic

myBB is also a nice forum.

item.title: Best Website For A RSPS?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

SMF will be the only forum software I will ever use. Host Gator is also my favorite webhost.
